full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for All Terrain Vehicles

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3734011228
* **Publication Date**: December 9, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 24, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 16, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Ongoing for up to five years, including optional years

## Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

## Description

This solicitation aims to establish a National Master Standing Offer for the supply of All Terrain Vehicles to Government of Canada departments and agencies, as well as Provincial/Territorial Identified Users, on an as-needed basis. The resulting Standing Offer(s) will cover delivery to locations across Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria

The selection will be based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
